verses.roman:
kṛṣṇera karuṇā kichu nā yāya varṇane
viṣaya-kūpa haite kāḍila tomā dui-jane

synonyms: kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; karuṇā—the mercy; kichu—any; nā—not; yāya—is possible; varṇane—to describe; viṣaya-kūpa haite—from the well of material enjoyment; kāḍila—delivered; tomā—you; dui-jane—both.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then said,"It is not possible to describe Kṛṣṇa's mercy, for He has delivered you both from the well of material enjoyment.
